data.field:
This nodelet shows how many votes you have remaining, out of your [id://5938|daily allotment]. It will also display your current [id://5938|experience points], if you have gained or [id://168266|lost] any since your last page load.

Note that the XP nodelet is always displayed if you have votes remaining or if there was an XP change. It cannot be turned off in your [id://25185].
